languages.text: {n}Лица женщины не видно за маской, но ее голос дрожит — не то от гнева, не то от страха.{/n} "И он {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}дал знать о тебе{/d}, {name} фон Валанциус. Самозван{mf|ец|ка}, переступивш{mf|ий|ая} дорогу Брату Сумерки... я отомщу за него".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лица женщины не видно за маской, но ее голос дрожит — не то от гнева, не то от страха.{/n} "И он дал знать о тебе, {name} фон Валанциус. Самозван{mf|ец|ка}, переступивш{mf|ий|ая} дорогу Брату Сумерки... я отомщу за него".

languages.text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}spread the word about you{/d}, {name} von Valancius. The interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."
languages.original_text: {n}Лица женщины не видно за маской, но ее голос дрожит — не то от гнева, не то от страха.{/n} "И он {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}дал знать о тебе{/d}, {name} фон Валанциус. Самозван{mf|ец|ка}, переступивш{mf|ий|ая} дорогу Брату Сумерки... я отомщу за него".

traits.locale_text: {n}You can't see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he got the word out about you, {name} von Valancius. An interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

{n}You can't see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he got the word out about you, {name} von Valancius. An interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

{n}You can't see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he got the word out about you, {name} von Valancius. An interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

{n}You can't see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he got the word out about you, {name} von Valancius. An interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

{n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he spread the word about you, {name} von Valancius. The interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

{n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he spread the word about you, {name} von Valancius. The interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

languages.text: {n}Du siehst das Gesicht der Frau hinter ihrer Maske nicht, doch ihre Stimme zittert vor Wut oder Angst.{/n} "Und er hat schon {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}von Euch berichtet{/d}, {name} von Valancius. Der Eindringling, der Bruder Zwielicht in die Quere gekommen ist ... Ich werde ihn rächen."
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}spread the word about you{/d}, {name} von Valancius. The interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst das Gesicht der Frau hinter ihrer Maske nicht, doch ihre Stimme zittert vor Wut oder Angst.{/n} "Und er hat schon von Euch berichtet, {name} von Valancius. Ein Eindringling, der Bruder Zwielicht in die Quere gekommen ist ... Ich werde ihn rächen."

languages.text: {n}Bien que vous ne voyiez pas le visage de la femme, caché derrière son masque, vous entendez sa voix trembler de colère ou de peur.{/n} « Et il a {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}parlé de vous autour de lui{/d}, {name} von Valancius. Vous êtes l'{mf|intrus|intruse} qui s'est {mf|opposé|opposée} à Frère Crépuscule... et croyez bien que je le vengerai ! »
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}spread the word about you{/d}, {name} von Valancius. The interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que vous ne voyiez pas le visage de la femme, caché derrière son masque, vous entendez sa voix trembler de colère ou de peur.{/n} « Et il a entendu parler de vous, {name} von Valancius. Vous êtes l'{mf|intrus|intruse} qui s'est {mf|opposé|opposée} à Frère Crépuscule... et croyez bien que je le vengerai ! »

languages.text: {n}你看不见那个女人藏在面具后面的脸，但她的声音颤抖着，可能是出于愤怒，也可能是出于恐惧。{/n}“他{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}散布了关于你的信息{/d}，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。你这个篡夺者，你挡住了‘暮光’兄弟的道路……我会杀了你，替他复仇。”
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}spread the word about you{/d}, {name} von Valancius. The interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

traits.locale_text: {n}你看不见那个女人藏在面具后面的脸，但她的声音颤抖着，可能是出于愤怒，也可能是出于恐惧。{/n}“他传来了关于你的信息，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。你这个篡夺者，你挡住了暮光兄弟的道路……我会杀了你，替他复仇。”

languages.text: {n}女の顔は仮面で見えないが、怒りからか恐怖からか、その声は震えている。{/n}「そして、あの方のおかげで{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}貴様は世間に知れることとなった{/d}、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。薄明の兄弟の邪魔をした侵入者め…私が仇を取ろう」
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}spread the word about you{/d}, {name} von Valancius. The interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

traits.locale_text: {n}女の顔は仮面で見えないが、怒りなのか恐怖なのか、その声は震えている。{/n}「そして、あの方のおかげで貴様は世間に知れることとなった、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。ブラザー・トワイライトの邪魔をした侵入者め…私が仇を取る」

languages.text: {n}No puedes ver el rostro de la mujer tras su máscara, pero su voz tiembla con lo que podría ser ira o miedo.{/n} «E {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}hizo correr la voz sobre ti{/d}, {name} von Valancius. Te has interpuesto en el camino del Hermano Crepúsculo... Le vengaré».
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}spread the word about you{/d}, {name} von Valancius. The interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

traits.locale_text: {n}No puedes ver el rostro de la mujer tras su máscara, pero su voz tiembla con lo que podría ser ira o miedo.{/n} «Y corrió la voz sobre ti, {name} von Valancius. Un intruso que se interpuso en el camino del Hermano Crepúsculo... Le vengaré».

languages.text: {n}Kadının maskenin ardındaki yüzünü göremiyorsun ancak sesi ya öfkeden ya da korkudan titriyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}Adını da her yere yayıyor{/d} {name} von Valancius. Sen, Rahip Seher'e köstek olan hadsizsin. Onun öcünü alacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot see the woman's face behind her mask, but her voice is trembling with what could be anger or fear.{/n} "And he {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}spread the word about you{/d}, {name} von Valancius. The interloper who got in Brother Twilight's way... I will avenge him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadının yüzü maskenin ardında saklandığı için göremiyorsun ancak sesi ya öfkeden ya da korkudan titriyor.{/n} "Adını duymayan kalmamasını sağladı {name} von Valancius. Rahip Seher'e köstek olan mütecavizsin... Onun öcünü alacağım."
